mutations.name: Legendary Attack-Defense Synergy
mutations.description: Creates an extraordinary synergy between Attack and Defense groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive an extraordinary attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a 40% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Legendary Control-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates an extraordinary synergy between Control and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive an extraordinary attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a 40% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Legendary Core Resonance
mutations.description: Creates an extraordinary synergy between Core and any other group
mutations.synergyEffect: Core group provides an extraordinary attribute bonus to all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Core group provides a 30% attribute bonus to all other groups

mutations.name: Complete Harmony
mutations.description: Creates a powerful synergy when all five role groups are present
mutations.synergyEffect: When all five role groups are present, all receive a substantial attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When all five role groups are present, all receive a 25% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Ability Mastery Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a synergy that dramatically amplifies ability effects across groups
mutations.synergyEffect: All groups gain substantial ability effectiveness bonuses based on the number of different roles present
mutations.effectDescription: All groups gain 10% ability effectiveness for each different role present in the creature
